CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Neuberger Berman Next Generation Connectivity Fund Inc.

Industry.label: Industry
Industry.value: Trusts, Except Educational, Religious, and Charitable

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The Fund seeks to provide capital appreciation and income through a global portfolio focused on dollar 13.1tn1 of potential opportunity in next generation connectivity. The Funds investment strategy focuses on equity securities issued by US and non-US companies, in any market capitalization range, that in the Portfolio Managers' view, demonstrate significant growth potential from the development, advancement, use or sale of products, processes or services related to the fifth generation mobile network and future generations of mobile network connectivity and technology.
